channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Alemha watermarker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Alemha watermarker

item.title: CVE-2024-3754|2024-08-01T20:20:01.066Z -- unknown -- alemha%20watermarker
item.description: The Alemha watermarker WordPress plugin through 1.3.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3754|2024-06-14T06:00:02.574Z -- unknown -- alemha%20watermarker
